original_text: Philip saw that he was now in Azotus. From there, he visited many towns and he told people the good news about Jesus. He did this as he went all the way to Caesarea.
korean_text: 빌립은 아소도에 나타나 여러 성을 지나 다니며 복음을 전하고 가이사랴에 이르니라

sentences.original_text: Philip saw that he was now in Azotus.
sentences.korean_translation: 빌립이 자신이 이제 아소도스에 있음을 보았다.

sentences.original_text: From there, he visited many towns
and he told people the good news about Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 사람들에게 예수에 대한 복음을 전했다.

sentences.original_text: He did this as he went all the way to Caesarea.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 가이사랴까지 가는 동안 이 일을 했다.
